DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess efficacy safety single multiple application FS-67 patch treatment ankle sprain pediatric population ( age 13-17 ) .
DOC.brief_title: FS-67 Treatment Pediatric Patients With Ankle Sprain
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Multicenter Study Assess Efficacy Safety FS-67 Patches Adolescent Subjects With Ankle Sprain
DOC.criteria: Grade 1 Grade 2 ankle sprain Pregnancy lactation
